title: Princess_Devi
author: Princess_Devi
content: Hi, just wondering is there any place to post about testnet/mainnet guides+potential airdrop future posts in here?

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: You're already on the Altcoin Discussion which can be the right section if you're wanting to post these testnet/mainnet guides. Another section is put and write that thread on the Service Discussion (Altcoins) but still, if the mods see your thread is on the wrong section like with those two that I've mentioned.They'll be the ones to move it to the right section which is based on their opinion or if they think that it has no substance, they might delete the entire guide.
